assignments.description: WOW packet #1 can be found on Mrs. VW`s website.  You may print it out, OR just write or type answers on a separate document.  The choice is yours.
assignments.name: WOW Packet #1

assignments.description: This paragraph should be written in the Assigned Writing section of your Writer`s Notebook
assignments.name: Transition Practice Paragraph

assignments.description:
Please submit first draft through Google Classroom. 
In Google Classroom, write a first draft of an EXPOSITORY paragraph on your topic. Give information and facts about your topic. You shouldn`t present your personal opinion on the topic. Imagine that your readers know nothing about the subject matter, so you have to write everything in detail, even things which seem evident to you. If you need to do some research in order to complete this paragraph, please do so. Just be sure to cite your sources. Also, your paragraph should be written in third person. So you may not use first or second person pronouns like I, me, you, we, etc.
assignments.name: Expository Paragraph First Draft

assignments.description: Write Mrs. VW an email.  The email should be just a few sentences long.  Tell her what your special place is.  This will be the topic of several writing assignments in the coming weeks.  Be sure you are familiar with the place.
assignments.name: Write Mrs. VW an email
